ascelion.merkle.help

Class DataSlice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ascelion.merkle.TreeLeaf<byte[],byte[]>
      • ascelion.merkle.help.DataSlice

  • public final class DataSlice
extends TreeLeaf<byte[],byte[]>
    Helper class to build a Merkle tree from data stream. The resulted tree contains instances of this class as leaves.
